name: INV_EOB_PAID_LINE
description: This table holds the service line level secondary information for a non-primary claim.  It contains the paid amount and other secondary amounts other than claim adjustments (CAS).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EOB_LN_CVG_ID
columns.description: The line coverage ID for a secondary claim.

columns.name: EOB_LN_CLM_LN
columns.description: This item points to the service line with which this related group line is associated.

columns.name: EOB_LN_PAID
columns.description: The line level paid amount for a secondary claim.

columns.name: EOB_LN_CONTRACT
columns.description: The lines contract amount for a secondary claim.

columns.name: EOB_LN_DATE
columns.description: The line adjudication date for a secondary claim.
